input.sentences: i went on vacation with friends to visit historical sights .
this is a large cathedral with a lot of seating .
we all had a lot of fun .
this was the best candy bar ever !
it was a long few days and we needed some naps
output.sentences: This years vacation sights were amazing.
We started by visiting the cathedral.
We had lots of fun during the trip.
I even bought a candy bar that wasn't for girls.
I was so tired I could take naps for days!
